medi:segment.name: Beginning of message
medi:segment.medi:documentation: BGM, A segment specifying the functional use (e.g. sub-set) of the Raw data reporting message and identifying the message.

medi:segment.name: Date/time/period
medi:segment.medi:documentation: DTM, A segment identifying dates, times, or periods which are relevant to the whole message.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 1: A group of segments identifying the name and address of the relevant parties, along with additional information related to the interchanging partners, such as references, contacts and communication numbers.

medi:segment.name: Name and address
medi:segment.medi:documentation: NAD, A segment to identify the relevant parties.

medi:segment.name: Reference
medi:segment.medi:documentation: RFF, A segment to specify a reference that the respondent wishes to communicate to the collector.

medi:segment.name: Free text
medi:segment.medi:documentation: FTX, A segment to provide free form or coded text information.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 2: A group of segments identifying a contact within the identified organization and communication number (e.g. telephone number, fax number).

medi:segment.name: Contact information
medi:segment.medi:documentation: CTA, A segment to identify a person or a department to whom communication should be directed.

medi:segment.name: Communication contact
medi:segment.medi:documentation: COM, A segment to identify a communication number of a department or a person to whom communication should be directed.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 3: A group of segments identifying a questionnaire, the responding organization, the questions in the questionnaire and the responses to the questions.

medi:segment.name: Identity
medi:segment.medi:documentation: IDE, A segment identifying a questionnaire.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 4: A group of segments identifying the responding organization to a questionnaire, the contact details, and administrative data relevant to the organization.

medi:segment.name: Name and address
medi:segment.medi:documentation: NAD, A segment identifying the responding organization.

medi:segment.name: Reference
medi:segment.medi:documentation: RFF, A segment to specify a reference that the responding organization wishes to communicate to the collector.

medi:segment.name: Free text
medi:segment.medi:documentation: FTX, A segment to provide free form or coded text information.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 5: A group of segments identifying a contact within, or representing, the responding organization and communication number (e.g. telephone number, fax number).

medi:segment.name: Contact information
medi:segment.medi:documentation: CTA, A segment to identify a person or a department to whom communication should be directed.

medi:segment.name: Communication contact
medi:segment.medi:documentation: COM, A segment to identify a communication number of a department or a person to whom communication should be directed.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 6: A group of segments which specify a question in a questionnaire and the data given in response.

medi:segment.name: Structure component definition
medi:segment.medi:documentation: SCD, A segment to specify the identity of a question (e.g. in a questionnaire).

medi:segment.name: Array information
medi:segment.medi:documentation: ARR, A segment containing the data in response to a question.

medi:segment.name: Reference
medi:segment.medi:documentation: RFF, A segment to specify a reference relevant to the response.

medi:segment.name: Date/time/period
medi:segment.medi:documentation: DTM, A segment identifying dates, times, or periods relevant to the response.

medi:segment.name: Free text
medi:segment.medi:documentation: FTX, A segment to provide free form or coded text information relevant to the response.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 7: A group of segments that identify an organization, contact information and administrative information given in response to a question.

medi:segment.name: Name and address
medi:segment.medi:documentation: NAD, A segment specifying the identity of an organization which is given in response to a question.

medi:segment.name: Reference
medi:segment.medi:documentation: RFF, A segment to specify a reference relevant to the organization.

medi:segment.name: Free text
medi:segment.medi:documentation: FTX, A segment to provide free form or coded text information.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 8: A group of segments identifying a contact within the identified organization and communication number (e.g. telephone number, fax number).

medi:segment.name: Contact information
medi:segment.medi:documentation: CTA, A segment to identify a person or a department to whom communication should be directed.

medi:segment.name: Communication contact
medi:segment.medi:documentation: COM, A segment to identify a communication number of a department or a person to whom communication should be directed.
